description: Defines the minimal set of files required for Dax workflow framework runtime operation

authority.description: Authoritative workflow definitions verified at bootstrap

invariants.bootstrap_verification: All files in 'authority' category must be verified by bootstrap.sh
invariants.sprint_artifacts: Each sprint must produce an execution summary linking to SPRINT_EXECUTION_SUMMARY_TEMPLATE.md
invariants.file_existence: All listed files must exist and be readable at runtime
invariants.execution_permissions: All .sh files must have execute permissions

exclusions.fallback_snapshots: Historical authority snapshots are not required for runtime operation
exclusions.visual_documentation: Workflow diagrams and visual aids are not required for runtime operation
exclusions.repository_metadata: README, REPOSITORY_MAP, and similar files are not required for runtime operation
exclusions.examples: Example templates (PRD_EXAMPLE.md, EPIC_LIST_EXAMPLE.md) are documentation aids, not required for runtime
